body_html:
Thanks @damienmg , bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:default-toolchain works out well!

But one more question, is there any solution for building with cuda support?
body_text:
Thanks @damienmg , bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:default-toolchain works out well!
But one more question, is there any solution for building with cuda support?
body:
Thanks @damienmg , `bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:default-toolchain` works out well!

But one more question, is there any solution for building with cuda support?
